title: /info/delay
description: Request the seconds of delay between the client and the server (of timestamps)
name: InfoDelay

Header.description: Milliseconds elapsed since 1 January 1970 00:00:00 UTC until now (output of Date.now())

Error 400.description: Timestamp is not set in the request's header

Success 200.description: Delay in seconds between the caller and the FPGA Web Service
Maximum delay allowed in seconds between the caller and the FPGA Web Service

examples.title: Example data on success

title: /info/ping
description: Simple request to test if the server is up
name: InfoPing

examples.title: Example data on success

title: /storage/stats
description: Request statistics of the storage (disk space, write speed, RAID)
name: StorageStats

Success 200.description: Total space in the device that stores the captures (in bytes)
Used space in the device that stores the captures (in bytes)
Flag to see if the RAID is being used for store captures. The rest of the fields below are only set if raid_active is true
Array of statistics for each disk of the RAID
